title: Introducing: Cold Cases “The Murder of Angela Samota.”
description:
Cold Cases is the latest Spotify Original from Parcast to hit the scene... Here’s an exclusive clip from their episode on “The Murder of Angela Samota.” It’s the story of a college student brutally murdered in her own home — and the lengths her friend would go to find answers.

If you’d like to finish this episode, be sure to follow Cold Cases free on Spotify. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
